code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec make_the_integer_zero(num1 :: integer, num2 :: integer) :: integer
  def make_the_integer_zero(num1, num2) do
    make_the_integer_zero_helper(num1, num2, 0)
  end

  defp make_the_integer_zero_helper(0, _, count), do: count
  defp make_the_integer_zero_helper(_, _, 61), do: -1
  defp make_the_integer_zero_helper(num1, num2, count) do
    best = Enum.reduce(0..60, {1.0e9, nil}, fn i, {min_count, _} ->
      delta = :math.pow(2, i) + num2
      new_num1 = num1 - delta
      abs_new_num1 = abs(new_num1)
      if abs_new_num1 < abs(num1) and abs_new_num1 < min_count, do: {abs_new_num1, i}, else: {min_count, nil}
    end)

    case best do
      {_, nil} -> -1
      {_, i} -> make_the_integer_zero_helper(num1 - (:math.pow(2, i) + num2), num2, count + 1)
    end
  end
end
